stanfordnlp/thoughtbubbles

parallel training for language models with dataset prep and programmatic access

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • large language model tutorials and training basics from scratch
  • open notes and guides for training large language models
  • Toolkit for serving and running large language models through an inference server
  • Executes reasoning paths in parallel with language models
  • minimal PyTorch code for training your own small language model from scratch
  • post-training recipe using RL to boost reasoning in language models
  • open datasets and models for training reasoning AI
  • Data analysis platform using large language models
